message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $100. How about we try to meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $108?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still not comfortable going above $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
